A time traveler goes back in time to prevent a tragedy from happening, but in doing so, they inadvertently change the course of history and the world as they know it.
A group of strangers are stranded on a deserted island after a plane crash and must work together to survive, but tensions rise as they begin to question their own motivations and secrets.
A person discovers that they have the ability to manipulate time and use it to their advantage, but as they experiment with their powers, they begin to realize the consequences of their actions.
A group of friends take a road trip across the country, but when they get lost in a strange town, they begin to experience strange and inexplicable events that make them question their own sanity.
A person is transported to an alternate reality where everything is different, but they must find a way back to their own world before they are trapped forever.
